history1: A long long time ago, I can still remember how that music used to make me smile. And I knew if I had my chance, I could make those people dance, and maybe they'd be happy, for a while...But February made me shiver, with every paper I'd deliver, bad news on the doorstep, I couldn't take one more step...I can't remember if I cried when I read about his widowed bride, but something touched me deep inside... The day the music died
history3: When that music used to make me smile
history4: And I knew if I had my chance
history5: I could make those people dance
